00001 /*
00002  * =====================================================================================
00003  *
00004  *       Filename:  routerVcMP.h
00005  *
00006  *    Description:  Router that can be used with meshes/multiple_vcs/DOR 
00007  *    1. Usess vcs purely for improving buffer and link utilization.
00008  *    2. Self contained: Example of how you can not use too many pseudo
00009  *    components
00010  *    3. WARNING: Does not check if the buffer is empty before sending a new
00011  *    pkt out. Uses the non blocking interface.
00012  *
00013  *        Version:  1.0
00014  *        Created:  03/11/2010 08:56:06 PM
00015  *       Revision:  none
00016  *       Compiler:  gcc
00017  *
00018  *         Author:  Mitchelle Rasquinha (), mitchelle.rasquinha@gatech.edu
00019  *        Company:  Georgia Institute of Technology
00020  *
00021  * =====================================================================================
00022  */
